mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECORDED_VIDEOS(id, recorder_thing_id, video_name, video_url, recording_time, recording_reason, stored_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{recorderThingId}, #{videoName}, #{videoUrl}, #{recordingTime}, #{recordingReason}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RECORDED_VIDEOS WHERE recorder_thing_id = #{arg0} ORDER BY recording_time DESC
